Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 11 Å (NaX, NaY), 7.3 Å (CHA), 4.6 Å and 4.4 Å (MFI)

Other Information.Additional Info: Higher selectivity observed at low loading due to strong cation-molecule interactions.
Lower selectivity compared to deuterium due to quantum effects.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale based on quantum effects.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: Selectivity ranges from 5.7 (MgX) to 2.4 (KX) at low loading; converges to 1.5±0.2 at high loading.

Other Information.Additional Info: Cation size plays a key role in determining selectivity at low loading; pore size has minimal effect in pure silica zeolites.
